nodes.name: Slack (Louis)

parameters.text:
=Here is what Louis emailed you:
```
{{$node["Merge Excuse and Mail Data"].json["textPlain"]}}
```

Here is how "you" responded:
> {{$node["Merge Excuse and Mail Data"].json["excuse"]}}

:+1: *You're Welcome!* :smirk:
